title: pErum pugazhum
sahitya:
pErum pugazhum nI peTruyyalAmE Arumukha nAthanin pEraruLAl manamE


anupallavi

  sIruDanE tigazhum cendUr kandan sIraDiyai dinam cintittu vandAl


caraNam    vAri aruT-koDai vazhangi vandiDum Ariru karamuDaiya pErupakAranAi
sIrum alaikaDal Oram kuDikoNDa tArakat-tilakan tirunAmam OdinAl
